name: Exquisitis
description:
A timeloop-based Puzzle-Platformer,
Developped with passion as a school project, during Autumn 2022

Your search for an artifact capable to bend time at will has succeeded, you found the Exquisitis! But as you put your hands on it, the old temple starts to crumble all around you, trapping you inside.

You'll have to escape using your newly-obtained artifact, creating "time-locked" versions of yourself repeating a few seconds of your actions as long as you leave them trapped in their loop. 

Use them to solve puzzles in the ominous rooms of the temple, and try not to die inside the ruins!

The build is currently only available for windows, try downloading it!
!! Game is in FRENCH (but still playable even if you don't speak it) !!

⚠️ This game is currently in a prototype state, and was made in three months as a school project. Yet, some of us are considering updating it in a few weeks/months to fix a lot of game-feel/pleasantness issues and add levels with more advanced puzzles. 

Hence, don't hesitate to tell us what you think about the game, so we can keep it in mind for further improvement!
